name: CHARLESTOWN TOWNSHIP, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA TURNPIKE COMMISSION, Appellee. Schuylkill Township, Intervenor. East Whiteland Township, Intervenor
name_abbreviation: Charlestown Township v. Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission

parties: CHARLESTOWN TOWNSHIP, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA TURNPIKE COMMISSION, Appellee. Schuylkill Township, Intervenor. East Whiteland Township, Intervenor.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 10th day of April, 2002, we AFFIRM the Order of the Commonwealth Court.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
798 A.2d 160
CHARLESTOWN TOWNSHIP, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA TURNPIKE COMMISSION, Appellee. Schuylkill Township, Intervenor. East Whiteland Township, Intervenor.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 10, 2002.
